General.Name: Cuentas Inc
General.Description: Cuentas Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides mobile, prepaid debit, and digital content services to the unbanked, underbanked, and underserved communities in the United States and internationally. It offers prepaid voice, text, and data mobile phone services; and domestic and international long-distance voice, text, and data telephony services. The company also provides a mobile app and general-purpose reloadable card, which are integrated into a fintech ecosystem that protects customers by depositing their funds in an FDIC insured bank account. In addition, it offers financial services, including direct ACH deposits, ATM access, retail and online purchases, peer to peer payments, cash reloads at various retailers, prepaid long distance telecom minutes, discounted gift cards for brands, and international and domestic mobile phone recharges. The company is based in Miami Beach, Florida.
General.Address: 235 Lincoln Road, Miami Beach, FL, United States, 33139
